eTXT is an immediate, quick, cost effective and simple way to reach your staff, suppliers and customers - straight to their text capable mobile phone.
eTXT is an internet service run by Bulletin Wireless that provides SMS messaging services from your email or web browser
eTXT combines the power of email and text to provide you with a cost effective and simple way to contact the people who matter, right to their mobile.
